---
title: Ankle Dorsiflexion ROM
---



# Technique

- Feel for end range before measuring
- Goniometry
    - Moving arm: 5th met
    - Stationary arm: head of fibula
- OKC
    - convex talus on concave mortise
    - less ROM might indicate worse stabilization and arthrokinematics
- CKC
    - Measuring DF of rear leg while lunging knee forward
    - Concave on convex

# Normal Values

- Expect: 10-20&deg;
